tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE eco_friendly_packaging_materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  material_type VARCHAR(50),
  supplier_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE packaging_distribution (
    packaging_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    distribution_center_id INT,
    date_received DATE
);

CREATE TABLE distribution_center (
    center_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    center_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE eco_friendly_packaging_materials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    material_type VARCHAR(100),
    supplier_name VARCHAR(200),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE distribution_centers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    center_name VARCHAR(200),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    capacity INT,
    contact_person VARCHAR(150)
)

CREATE TABLE tracking_records (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    center_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE eco_friendly_packaging_materials (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity_in_stock INT NOT NULL,
    price_per_unit DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    from_center_id INT NOT NULL,
    to_center_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity_shipped INT NOT NULL,
    shipping_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_id INT NOT NULL,
    packaging_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity_packaged INT NOT NULL,
    packaging_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE shipments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    center_id INT,
    quantity INT
);
